trans-unit.source: Models the throwing of an exception.
This class cannot be inherited.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The purpose of the ThrowActivity is to allow declarative modeling of the throwing of an exception.
The ThrowActivity is functionally equivalent to a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity whose code-beside handler throws the indicated exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ThrowActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ThrowActivity"></xref> class, and initializes its name.
The user-defined name of the activity.
identifier is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets the exception object that should be thrown by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ThrowActivity"></xref>.
You indirectly access each public property and event of this type by the resolution of a corresponding dependency property.
This dependency property is the public static field named `XProperty` or `XEvent`, where X is the corresponding property.
The <xref:System.Exception> associated with this instance.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> representing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ThrowActivity.Fault*> property for this instance.
To be added.
Gets or sets the type of exception that should be thrown by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ThrowActivity"></xref>.
The type representing the fault associated with this instance.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> representing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ThrowActivity.FaultType*> property for this instance.
You indirectly access each public property and event of this type by the resolution of a corresponding dependency property.
This dependency property is the public static field named `XProperty` or `XEvent`, where X is the corresponding property.
To be added.
To be added.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified <xref:System.Type> can be filtered.
The <xref:System.Type> to check for filtering

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to throw an exception when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider.CanFilterType*> is processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified type can be filtered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the description for the filter to be displayed on the class browser dialog box.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the description of the filter.
Returns the access type for the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate if the properties are correctly bound to one other.
Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are needed.
The name of the property.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> enumeration value denoting the access level of the property.
Returns the <xref:System.Type> of the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate if the properties are correctly bound to one other.
An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are needed.
The name of the property.
The for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.
